home.title: Upcoming Presidential Election!
home.description: Your voice matters. Make sure to cast your vote and shape the future.
home.defaultIntro: The election is about to begin! Learn about the candidates and cast your vote!
admin.login.title: Admin Access
admin.login.description: Enter the password to access the admin section.
toast.pollUpdatedSuccessDescription: The poll "{{title}}" has been successfully updated.
toast.pollDeletedDescription: The poll has been successfully deleted.
toast.errorSavingPollDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
toast.errorLoadingPollDescription: An unexpected error occurred while loading the poll.
toast.errorLoadingSettingsVisibilityDesc: Could not load results visibility. Defaulting to private.
toast.errorLoadingHomeIntroDescription: Could not load home page introductory text.
toast.errorLoadingVoteIntroDescription: Could not load vote page introductory text.
toast.errorSavingSettingsVisibilityDescr: Could not save results visibility setting.
toast.homeIntroSavedDescription: The introductory text for the home page has been updated.
toast.voteIntroSavedDescription: The introductory text for the vote page has been updated.
toast.candidateNameEmptyDescription: Please enter a name for the candidate.
toast.avatarUploadErrorDescription: Could not process the avatar image. Using default.
toast.pollTitleEmptyDescription: Please enter a title for the poll.
toast.notEnoughCandidatesDescription: A poll must have at least two candidates.
toast.invalidVoteLimitDescription: Max votes per client must be at least 1 if vote limiting is enabled.
toast.invalidMaxSelectionsDescription: Maximum selections must be at least 1 if multi-select is enabled.
toast.invalidMaxSelectionsTooLargeDescri: Maximum selections cannot exceed the number of candidates.
toast.pollNotFoundDescription: Could not find a poll with ID: {{pollId}}. Redirecting...
toast.errorSavingPollOriginalNotFoundDes: Original poll data not found. Cannot update.
toast.errorSavingPollNotFoundInStorageDe: Could not find the poll to update in storage.
toast.errorLoadingDataDescription: Could not load data. Please try again later.
toast.selectionLimitReachedDescription: You can only select up to {{maxSelections}} candidate(s) for this poll.
toast.selectionRequiredDescription: Please select a poll and at least one candidate.
toast.pollClosedDescription: This poll is no longer accepting votes.
toast.tooManySelectionsDescription: You have selected more than the allowed {{maxSelections}} candidates.
toast.voteLimitReachedDescription: You have already cast the maximum of {{maxVotes}} vote(s) for this poll.
toast.pollJustClosedDescription: This poll is no longer accepting votes.
toast.voteSubmittedDescription: Your vote for {{candidateNames}} in "{{pollTitle}}" has been recorded.
toast.homeTitleSavedDescription: The title for the home page has been updated.
toast.errorSavingHomeTitleDescription: Could not save home page title.
toast.errorLoadingHomeTitleDescription: Could not load home page title.
toast.homeDescriptionSavedDescription: The description for the home page has been updated.
toast.errorSavingHomeDescriptionDescript: Could not save home page description.
toast.errorLoadingHomeDescriptionDescrip: Could not load home page description.
admin.createPoll.title: Create New Poll
admin.createPoll.description: Define the title, candidates, and settings for your new poll.
admin.createPoll.scheduledCloseTimeDescr: Leave blank if you want to close the poll manually.
admin.createPoll.voteLimitBypassNote: Client limits are browser-based and can be bypassed.
admin.createPoll.maxSelectionsDescriptio: Max number of candidates a user can select.
admin.createPoll.addAtLeastTwoCandidates: Add at least two candidates for the poll.
admin.dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.dashboard.description: Manage your eVote application settings and content.
admin.dashboard.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the poll "{{pollTitle}}" and all its associated data.
admin.dashboard.managePollsFooter: Toggle poll status, edit details, or delete polls.
admin.dashboard.resultsVisibilityFooter: Controls whether non-admin users can view poll results.
admin.dashboard.homePageTitlePlaceholder: Enter the main title for the home page
admin.dashboard.homePageDescriptionPlace: Enter the description text for the home page
admin.dashboard.adminAccessDeniedDescrip: You are not authorized to view this page. Redirecting to login...
admin.editPoll.loadingDescription: Please wait while we fetch the poll details for editing.
admin.editPoll.notFoundDescription: The poll you are trying to edit could not be found. It might have been deleted.
admin.editPoll.title: Edit Poll
admin.editPoll.description: Modify the details and settings for this poll.
admin.editPoll.scheduledCloseTimeWarning: Warning: Scheduled time is in the past. Poll will close on save if still open.
resultsPage.resultsNotPublicDescription: The results for this poll are not yet publicly available. Please check back later or contact an administrator.
resultsPage.noPollResultsSpecificDescrip: Could not find results for the specified poll.
resultsPage.noPollResultsGeneralDescript: There are currently no poll results available. Please create a poll and cast some votes.
resultsPage.tieOrTallying: There is currently a tie or votes are still being tallied.
resultsPage.awaitingVotesDescription: No votes have been cast in this poll yet. Be the first!
resultsPage.noCandidatesFound: No candidates found for this poll.
resultsPage.selectPollPlaceholder: Select a poll to view results
resultsPage.selectPollPromptDescription: Please select a poll from the dropdown above to view its results.
votePage.noActivePollsDescription: There are currently no active polls available for voting. Please check back later.
votePage.availablePollsDescription: Click on a poll to see its candidates and cast your vote.
votePage.pollClosedDescription: This poll is currently closed and not accepting new votes.
votePage.multiSelectDescription: You can select up to {{maxSelections}} candidate(s).
votePage.voteLimitDescription: This poll allows a maximum of {{maxVotes}} vote(s) per client.
votePage.voteLimitNote: Note: This limit is browser-based and can be bypassed.
votePage.noCandidatesText: No candidates available for this poll.
votePage.defaultIntro: Review the candidates below and make your selection. Click on a candidate's card to select them, then submit your vote.
votePage.pollList.introText: Choose a poll from the list below, then review its candidates and cast your vote.
candidateCard.disabledAriaLabel: {{candidateName}} (voting closed, limit reached, or max selections made)
